CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Analogous event has also been realized in D-A type of oligomers and polymers based on 3,4bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene or 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene as donor and BT as acceptor , which demonstrated that with the depleting composition of BT unit along the conjugated backbone , the dual absorbing bands were induced to move toward the maximum absorption ( λ max ) of the all - donor homopolymer that located in between of the dual absorbance.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 3,4-bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene |
| 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene |
| BT (presumably a abbreviation for "Benzothiazole") |

Note: "BT" is not explicitly mentioned as a material name in the paragraph, but it is mentioned as an acceptor material in the context of the sentence, so it is included in the list.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 3,4-bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)thiophene |
| 2-ethylhexyloxy-substituted 3,4-propylenedioxythiophene |

The paragraph does not mention any other material names besides these two. "BT" is not explicitly mentioned as a material name, and it is not clear whether it refers to a specific material or is a generic term. Therefore, the table above only includes the two material names that are explicitly mentioned in the paragraph.
